function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Fluctuations in demand leading to fast reductions or spikes in demand for products.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on global suppliers leading to shortages of essential goods and equipment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vague definition of critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased vulnerability to cascading disruptions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex and transboundary crisis management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel restrictions halting the flow of essential staff","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of personnel for critical infrastructure operations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Obstacles in filling specialized positions due to crisis-induced delays","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability of essential medical supply chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid shifts in the definition of critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Interconnectedness of critical infrastructure systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific measures or laws regarding identification and protection of critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in understanding the notion of critical infrastructure in European Union countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited protection to facilities or objects without considering dependencies or interdependencies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in critical infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective cooperation among stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficiencies in protection of critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of precise knowledge about upcoming pandemics and their spreading behavior","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate building codes and certificates for post-pandemic residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on energy-consuming technologies and smart systems for work from home practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient emphasis on social and health aspects in building sustainability rating methods","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deficiencies in existing residential buildings in terms of health and safety risks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased consumption of energy and water in residential houses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Open plan living leading to lack of private space","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate layout design for different needs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of preparation for future disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of transmission due to shared spaces in housing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper arrangement of home workspaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption in residential buildings due to work from home practices during COVID-19 lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Population trapped in their homes during the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to increased demand for comfort and flexibility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible spread of the coronavirus through wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of attention to environmental aspects of personal protective equipment disposal","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to clean drinkable water","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to respiratory issues","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of water and wastewater with the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased promotion of antimicrobial additions in building products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative psychological effects of quarantine on mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased greenery in urban environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission via sewage due to human feces contamination in wastewater","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in housing layout and design leading to potential lack of privacy and overcrowding","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of indoor finishing materials impacting virus lifetimes on surfaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission risk through contact with surfaces in bathrooms and public restrooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health risks associated with toxic antimicrobial additives in indoor finishing materials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to potential spread of viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of virus transmission via contaminated surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on health systems during unexpected situations like pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to visit hospitals or healthcare facilities due to lockdowns","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited involvement of architects and urban planners in response to pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited focus on the social pillar in sustainability assessment rating systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unequal priority given to key sustainability categories in rating systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
